title: LF Team -> (Currently) P2 ADC Much Team Experience
body:
Hey there.

I am a platinum 2 ADC main and I am looking to join a new/existing ranked team. I have had many experiences in ranked teams beforehand. I was in a diamond 1 team last pre-season and we were (at the time) practicing from 6:30pm untill roughly 11pm each night. I was also diamond pre-season too.
If you'd like more information, please add me IGN: Truesh0t 

Thank you, and I'll see you on the rift.
